entry.title: 5 pack | 6"x14" Fushia Satin Rosette Spandex Stretch Chair Sash
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: Chair Sashes
Price: 5.79

[About]

1 Qty: 5 Sashes
Material: Satin Rosette atop Spandex Fabric
Color: Fushia
Size: 6" x 14"
Works for Banquet style chairs
Fit: Banquet Chair back measuring 17" wide max
For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.
Buy Sash Buckles

 

[Information]

Combining the sleek shiny softness of premium quality satin rosette with flexibility of stretch spandex, these chair belts are a perfect adornment for your party or banquet chairs. Large satin roses are crafted side by side on silk fabric to attain a truly fanciful feel and texture. Attribute of elasticity makes these chair ties or chair belts equally exquisite for variant sizes and types of chairs. Glam your Chiavari or Banquet chairs by using these floral fantasies on their own or create a charismatic cohesive ambiance by pairing with our satin or rosette Chair Covers, Chair Skirts, Table Covers, Table Skirts, Table Runners, or Napkins

Additional Information:

  • How to Care: Machine Washable, Tumble Dry, Low Heat
  • For sashes only, does not include any other decorations
  • Uses : Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
